__e: Just because Mrs. Christian praised your discretion you sat on evidence of murder, dragged your friend, family into some old graveyard to dig up a dead girl with no name that nobody remembers.
I brought Christina to you specifically for your discretion and expertise.
Listen, thank you very much for your discretion, and....
"I am assured from your description that you are discretion itself.
And I give him chance to speak: I will be the soul of the discretion.
I assure you Mr. Ahren that Doctor Watson is the very sole of discretion.
As I said, your talent for discretion will come in handy.
I am sorry we have to meet like this... but confidentiality is the heart and soul of my work.
